#summary jQuery Dependency
#labels Phase-Deploy

= jQuery Dependency =
The NetOpenIDSelector control depends on jQuery because of the JavaScript that it uses.  

Therefore, the control exposes a Property called LoadjQuery and if it is set to true, the control loads jQuery automatically:

{{{
<OpenIDSelector:NETOpenIDSelector ID="NETOpenIDSelector1" runat="server" LoadjQuery="true" OnSelectorChosen="Selected" />
}}}

http://lh3.ggpht.com/_xl08dEExoZk/S7sCHSRCdUI/AAAAAAAAA0E/b05_Q3E7ags/jquerydependency.png

If LoadjQuery is not set to true, then you must manually load jQuery yourself.
